cause.description:
Saskatchewan has no Sex Offender Registry, and this needs to change...NOW! Why should our children be at risk; what is so wrong with this province that we can't protect the future generations from being victims?! Sometimes only a few people can make all the difference...
1. To Educate Ourselves As Parents/Gaurdians.
2. Protect The Innocent.
cause.name: Saskatchewan Sex Offender Registry
